review: Having braces and retainers was such a wonderful experience and I would definitely recommend the Smile Gallery Dental Clinic for this!! Dr. Hetal and her staff are very professional, courteous, and considerate. I was regularly informed about what to expect throughout treatment, I was never kept waiting past my appointment time, and I am very pleased with the outcome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was advised to go for full mouth reconstruction FMR  by way of Dental Implants  called # #ALL ON 6##  as my other tooth were not in a condition  to go for partial dentures. I know Dr.hetal since years and complete trust. She gave me confidence and she herself was very confident with huge experience.  Before heading for the procedure she explained me the pros and cons of having implants and full mouth dentures but my case was bit challenging .

She boosted my confidence and advised me like a own family member  before heading for the  procedure  she gave me  few tests needs to be done as a safety precautionary  measure.  After the major surgery was done . She  even  made a regular check  of me by  making  a follow up  calls  and explaining  me  after procedure details

After undergoing  bone graft procedure  even in my trails she  gave back the work to lab technician  until she was satisfied  with my   teethwork  and shade of my teeth .

At the final Day of fixing my work she was Mr happy  than  me  with the end result...The journey  from 03.12 to 21.09 was amazing   for dr.hetal and her team 

All Thanks to DR.HETAL Chheda and SMILE GALLERY  TEAM for making my  work as their priority  and gave the best  today I'm doo happy and can eat and speak confidently

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited smile gallery last week because of my bleeding gums before that I visited some other clinic..but I was not happy and unsatisfied with their way of taking precautionary measures and explanation.Before taking my appointment with this clinic..I made a call to ask what precautionary measures they take....The staff quickly responded my call and explained me about how they take precautions before and after a person enter the clinic....she was very soft spoken. When I entered the clinic..There  were 2 person sitting at the waiting area. They made one person sit in other room and another far away from me..to maintain social distance from me. They entered my details took my O2 ,checked my body temperature and Bp for safer side...gave me my safety wear and instructions not to touch anywhere..The doctor was also very soft spoken checked my teeth advised to go for cleaning and took some x-rays and informed me about my cavities....I was very much satisfied by Dr.Hetal's  consultation. Also did my few cavities..I highly recommend to visit her clinic once.##SmileGallery Dental clinic###Thank you soo much for solving and clearing my üòçüòçdoubt to all staff and doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This is the most satisfying treatment which my Mother in law Mrs Neha Chheda had been getting throughout her whole mouth implant journey...it was painless and she never faced any problem...till date she is very much happy with the decision she had taken....I recommend Dr Hetal Chheda for any of the dental treatment...she also takes regular follow ups so that patient should not face any problem...Thank you ‚ò∫Ô∏è

review: I had recently had my dental fillings done at Smile Gallery Dental Clinic and I was thoroughly impressed by the level of care and hygiene taken care by the doctor and the staff. The staff is super friendly and took care of my comfort and well being throughout the procedure and the procedure too was really smooth with Dr. Hetal and her staff being by my side from updated equipment to systematic procedure this place has it all So it my one and only stop for dental treatments and I recommend you this place as well

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review:
I visited Smile gallery for the first time for my dental consultation... I before never done any of dental treatment but due to my pain I visited dr. Hetal...for her best and promising treatment which I heard from others..... She recommended me to go for full mouth open which was already there in her clinic which  was less trouble for me... After that she recommended for to go for cleaning and cavities and few teeth removal and place an implant instead.... I went through all procedure as she advised me.... Today I'm really happy to share my experience with others that I chose the right place for my treatment....inspite it's my first ever dental visit... 
I wish  SMILE GALLERY a very hearty thanks and spread the smile like this to everyone

I visited smile gallery for my dental issues i got this reference from one of my friend recommendations...i went through few root canals and implant procedure....the treatment here was painless and it went smoothly....with all safety measures 
I would highky recommend Smile gallery for all dental problems and their staff and dr.was really co-operative throughout the entire process

Doctor didn't guided *** ***** ***** brushing technique as well , for that purpose she needed to come and first take her all treatments plans and then only she will guide. If we came for consultation, atleast guide ** *** ***** ****** which we are missing in our daily activities.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hii, there I visited smile gallery for my front tooth which got chipped due to a fall.... Dr hetal advised me to go for natural tooth coloured filling... Which was done in 1 visit....im really happy with my smile how even it looks.... Without any shy... Thanks dr. Hetal and smile gallery team for wonderful work

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our wedding is in December, And from last 8 years she had a cavity in her front two teeth. We visited Smile Galary last week. Dr. Hetal mam gave her excellent treatment and fixed her smile. We are so thankful to Dr. Hetal mam and all the staff for giving the wonderful treatment at very affordable fees.

review:
My wife is a dentist by occupation. But after meeting Dr. Hetal I was very much pleased to receive the best support and cooperative services.

She is very helpful, friendly and accommodating.

Highly recommend visiting her clinic for any dental problems.

review: I have travel from Parle to get my dental implants and crown and bridges here from Dr Hetal Chheda.i truly vouch for her work.got root canal done in painless method and by latest technology. All well equipped in single roof..pretty flexible with timings.and caring nature of entire staff..in such covid times all necessary precautions and sterilization protocols  were taken.***** ****** ** ******** **** *** ************** *********** *

review:
Hi my all teeth were very bad condition at such a stage they were shaking  then I visited few doctors but I wasn't so happy with the opinion that they gave....then I visited SMILE GALLERY to take another opinion dr.hetal suggested me to go for  full mouth implant and she told I will get my all teeth within 7 days...then she advised me to go for few blood reports  as a safety measures before going surgery I was very much convinced  the way she explained ...I underwent the procedure for the surgery now today  I'm so happy with the treatment what she has advised I can eat and speak properly 
Thank you doctor HETAL ##SMILE GALLERY  DENTAL CLINIC ## I would advise all to visit her once  for her dental problems
